description.en:
ExChain is a deserialized net for identity. EXT is a token for the future as the ID of the deserialize world.
Our Dapp is called 'Experience'. It may become the next LinkedIn, or DingTalk. Someone also say it is Facebook + WeChat !

Use the X.509 digital standard to save person or organization’s identity data. Applying the PoWS mechanism to verify people's digital identity and past professional working experiences. These ensure the authenticity of one’s digital identity and professional credit.

We use decentralized blockchain technology for its trustless, high transparency and tamper resistance characteristics to build a decentralized multi-layer user experience data model. Users can trade or update their experience data freely while maintaining the ownership of the data.

By the Smart Contract of ExChain we can make it perfect to recruit or get jobs through all over the world. The cross border under ExChain can protect both parties benefits between companies and the job seekers. And at the same time, the growing transaction on ExChain also enriched our users' identity data.
